backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing user profiles, visitor records, admin password controls, and access‑controlled CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module preserving stable state, updating adminPassword when needed during upgrades.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten textual summaries of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App root wiring React Query, theming, and rendering VisitorTracker with toast support.
frontend/src/components/AdminLogin.tsx: Dialog for verifying admin password with validation, error handling, and async unlock flow.
frontend/src/components/ChangeAdminPassw: Dialog for updating the admin password with client-side validation and status handling.
frontend/src/components/VisitorForm.tsx: Form for submitting new visitor records with validation and mutation to backend.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTable.tsx: Displays visitor records in a table with editing via a dialog and updates handled through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorTracker.t: Combines visitor form, table, admin login, and export features with admin-gated actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMode.ts: Manages admin unlock state using backend verification and session storage with lock/unlock handlers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and handles login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on visitor records and admin password changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/exportToCSV.ts: Converts visitor records into CSV format and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXLSX.ts: Dynamically loads SheetJS to convert visitor records into a formatted XLSX workbook with set column widths and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Converts a bigint nanosecond timestamp to a human‑readable date string using US locale formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and handling hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for the visitor tracking tool.
